2.speaker: Minsc
2.text: Boo has been speaking to a certain squirrel-friend who frequents our camp, Halsin.
2.context: NodeContext: Aside, to Boo. Misunderstanding 'bear witness'. Shaking head, doesn't understand Halsin at all.

1.speaker: Minsc
1.text: He was turned from a red squirrel to a grey, all by one shocking sight. Minsc thinks you owe him an apology.
1.context: NodeContext: Aside, to Boo. Misunderstanding 'bear witness'. Shaking head, doesn't understand Halsin at all.

0.speaker: Halsin
0.text: Apologise for partaking in one of nature's most solemn rites? That squirrel should be glad to bear witness.
0.context: NodeContext: Aside, to Boo. Misunderstanding 'bear witness'. Shaking head, doesn't understand Halsin at all.

3.speaker: Minsc
3.text: ...No, Boo, I do not know what this has to do with the bears...
3.context: NodeContext: Aside, to Boo. Misunderstanding 'bear witness'. Shaking head, doesn't understand Halsin at all.
